text: Julie Christmas (born December 25, 1975) is an American musician. She was the lead singer of the rock band Made Out of Babies and the metal band Battle of Mice. Christmas released three albums with Made Out of Babies. They broke up in 2012. Christmas sung on "Generation of Ghosts" on Mouth of the Architect's 2008 album Quietly. In 2010, Christmas released her first solo album The Bad Wife on CD and vinyl. ==References== Category:Living people Category:American rock singers Category:1975 births
title: Julie Christmas
